meta.description: Optimize production planning to maximize revenue considering production, storage, and workforce adjustments.

params.name: production_per_worker
params.description: Units produced per worker per month

params.name: max_extra_units_per_worker
params.description: Maximum extra units a worker can produce per month

params.name: storage_cost
params.description: Cost per unit stored per month

params.name: max_worker_change
params.description: Maximum change in number of workers per month

vars.name: warehouse
vars.description: Units stored in warehouse each month

vars.name: hired
vars.description: Number of workers hired each month

vars.name: laid_off
vars.description: Number of workers laid off each month

objective.name: max_revenue
objective.expr: sum((production_per_worker * workers[m] + extra_units[m] - demand[m]) * storage_cost for m in MONTHS) - sum(extra_units[m] * extra_unit_cost for m in MONTHS) - sum(hired[m] * hiring_cost + laid_off[m] * layoff_cost for m in MONTHS)
objective.description: Maximize revenue by balancing production, storage, and workforce costs
